content.detailedDescription:
Harmar, allegheny county, 14 miles n of pittsburgh, pa off the pa turnpike.  have a new vacation house on the allegheny river in harmar, pa across from famous oakmont country club golf course.  we were wiring paddle fans late when i went onto the porch facing the river to get something.  noticed crazy flashing multiple lights over oakmont c.C. that gave me flashback to my sighting in murrysville on 5-22-09. grabbed sony hdr-xr500 with 1.7 tele converter lens and started shooting, first in nightshot, then low-lux.  i've seen a lot of planes & helicopters where i live and this didn't look like anything i've ever seen.  it looked first like a race car or choo-choo at first, then finally a more plane-like appearance.  in review of the video, i could see that it's 'tail' end appears to change position.  the lighting patterns are not consistent, some lights go out, and then towards the end the lights are straight across--flashing again in a non-consistent pattern.  at no time did i see a green right side navigation light which is faa requirement.  at no time during or after did i hear any noise whatsoever from the craft which was about 100.  it cruised above the tree line, then turned downward dipping into the allegheny river basin behind some trees on 12-mile island (in the middle of the river) in the direction of oakmont yacht club.  it was not heading towards any airport around here.  there are no airports anywhere near here.  i'm trying to request a radar report, but the faa sight has a "page error", of course (not that they would give me it anyway).

i've witnessed several different types of ufos, but this one is unique.  it reminded me of the type seen and filmed by john lenard walson in outer space and is posted also on youtube channels:  johnlenardwalson & gridkeeper.  they are too freaky to be seen in daytime, so perhaps that's why we've no daytime footage yet.

the size of my really cool hd video is too large to upload here, so please go to my youtube channel name: seeingufospa to see this video and my other sighting videos in hd. if anyone knows exactly what this is and has video proof of night lighting, etc., they can upload it on yt as a video response.  hearsay of "secret government projects" will not be accepted.
content.summary: Low altitude strange ufo that changes light patterns by pittsburgh.

content.detailedDescription:
my name is ben woods and i have been published in both magazines and online as having access to where and when the usaf secretly test flies their et disc.  on a recent expedition taken may 28th we collected enough images to submit to the star impact project.  i have included one of the photos in the attachment and some additional information has been posted at http://www.Secretetsaucers.Com  it is the website i use to post research results during correspondence with ufologists on my mailing list.
  during this incident i was positioned at an observing location just outside of las vegas with a photographer and portable observatory.  the photo camp includes 1 tracking camera, 1 meade lunar planetary imager placed into a 800mm tracking telescope and 1 3.2ghz cpu with 19 inch monitor.  we waited until 5:30am which was the scheduled test time for the disc and when it was picked up by the tracking camera at about 5:35am we began collecting images.
  the disc has several unique flight characteristics that can be seen during the tests.  the major "action or motion" that can be observed is hover flight.  it also exhibits zig zag motion..Nothing like conventional flight.
  i am available now to accomodate and discuss research objectives mufon and sip may have.  i had contacted mr. carrion last month and he has been waiting for my information.

  once i have been contacted through the email account i provided here i can send over my phone number.

ben woods
content.summary: Secret usaf disc being tested near las vegas as a possible case for the mufon star impact project.

content.detailedDescription: Bus stop at sunrise. saw and then gone. they hover.
content.summary: Fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was reading ca june 14th "v" shaped contrail report today when i realized the extremely wide and odd contrail matched what i saw this morning over ottawa ontario canada.These contrails also had an odd pattern and were unreasonably wide even for a plane such as the a380.I know this cause recently with all the open sky treaties more planes fly directly over us than i have seen in years.At first i thought the wind might have change the shape and width of the contrails but soon realized they weren't changing at all and remained for a good 30 or so minutes.After reading the report i thought these contrails might be similar to those reported earlier and by filling this report maybe someone else may be able to corilate other such reports.At first i surely would of dismissed these, but reading the ca report i decided i would offer up this report and with any luck someone else will report seeing something more.
content.summary: Extremely wide odd shaped contrails.

content.detailedDescription: A light appeared low on the horizon above the tree line of the distant hills in medford in the south western sky. the light would go from dim to bright in about 2 seconds. it would then dart around a bit from side to side and up and down then fade out. this happened over a period of about an hour and a half or so in various locations, but all were roughly about the same altitude. i heard no airplane sounds of helicopter sounds associated with the lights. the number of times it appeared and dissappeared was about 4 to 5 times. anyone else in medford see this?
content.summary: Bright light.

content.detailedDescription: Sunday june 21, 2009 i was out in my backyard when i looked up in the sky and say a flashing light as bright and large as venus moving slowly from the west to the east at approximately 10,000ft. the light would flash very brightly silvery-white as large as venus then flash as a pinpoint then back again. as i was watching this, 5 small cigar shaped objects caught my eye moving from the south to the north. as i watched these objects which were approximately at 8,000ft, 3 were together and 2 were in front and slightly to the side with all 5 moving faster then a jet airliner. the 3 objects were moving in a counter clockwise motion as they were moving forward. they objects then disapeared.  i looked back at the large silvery-white light for a few more seconds and it to just disapeared. the sighting lasted for about 1 minute.This was in santa clara, california about 12 noon.
content.summary: Bright flashing star-like light and moving w to e and 5 cigar like moving s to n.

content.detailedDescription: 2 cone's 1 on top of the other lights all round the middle and one light on top part and bottom prat of the cone's. i was going up 2 my ma's house and as i walked there i looked up and der it was it was about 25feet long maybe more. i believe it is an ufo. the object was still
content.summary: can't say.

content.detailedDescription: We were at work in are workshop i whent outside on my teabreak, and looked up in the air i saw large black object moveing up and down slowly, i called my workmate out and he had his camera which he put into video mode ,it then started to move up faster it was big you could see it going though cloud as big as a lage jet i would say.It then moved so high we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Large cylinder object on camera hovers above our workshop.

content.detailedDescription: 2 cone's 1 on top of the other lights all round the middle and one light on top part and bottom prat of the cone's. i was going up 2 my ma's house and as i walked there i looked up and der it was it was about 25feet long maybe more. i believe it is an ufo. the object was still
content.summary: can't say.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from lakefield towards bridgenorth on eighth line just past burckhorn rd. when a white flash in the sky caught my attention.  i looked up and seen a circle with a piece missing from it. best way to describe it is it looked like a cookie with a bite taken out of it or like a 3/4 moon.  it's entire surface flashed bright white and then the light disappeared and it shot forward at a speed i had never seen before, it was almost instantly out of sight like it had never been there.  my mind did not want believe what my eyes were seeing, i was stunned.
content.summary: Like a 3/4 moon, or a perfect circle with a bite taken out of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting outside in my midtown kansas city back yard about 10:30-10:45pm talking.  i live about 5 miles south of the downtown airport, so it is not unusual to see aircraft flying flow.  we noticed two objects in the sky headed in a straight line from south to north (as if they were headed to the airport).  the second object was about a second or two behind the first, both traveling in exactly the same line, same speed.  at first i assumed they were airplanes.  about 2 seconds later, another object came into view -- same size, speed, trajectory as the first two.  another second or two later a fourth object followed, and a second or two later a fifth object did the exact same path.  all were identical.... i don't believe they were airplanes.  i saw no flashing lights, there was no sound (i often hear sound with planes landing downtown, just identical yellow/orange fireballs streaming through the sky.

i have lived in this same location 15 years and have seen many, many planes fly by.  the first two objects that went by would not necessarily have caused me to research further.  three caught my attention more... five convinced me this was something very unusual.
content.summary: Fireballs in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the willowcreek park (149 and harrison) friday, june 19, 2009 at around 9:45 pm when the four children we were with started pointing and shouting for us to look at the "fireball" in the sky. we (2 adults) turned to look (toward the east) and we saw a fairly large, brightly lit "flying craft" just over the trees and houses in the neighborhood.  at first i assumed it was an airplane, but immediately realized it was something else that i have never seen before and cannot identify logically.  it was a bright, yellow-orange light in a somewhat trapeziodal shape, covered with a haze that diffused the edges, making it hard to define the exact shape,  it also seemed to have a brighter spot in the center.  it was slowly heading towards the park, but as the kids started shouting and pointing, it stopped moving forward, hovered for around 5-10 seconds, then began moving away from us (to the west) getting smaller, but then it was just gone!

it was definitely some sort of "aircraft".  it was not a firework, weather balloon, prop plane or even military plane.  we are near the airbase and a small airport, but this was nothing like any of the planes that we see flying overhead.  it was super-bright, entirely lit over the body of the object.  it literally was flying forward, hovered, then flew back in the direction it came from. then in an instant it was gone. i've never known a plane that can do that.

the children said that when they noticed it and began pointing and shouting, the craft stopped moving towards us, as if it saw them.

the object also changed shape when in began moving backwards, from the hazy trapezoid to an elongated oval.

it was totally silent, which was strange for how close it was.  we (the two adults) may not have even been aware of it if the children hadn't seen it first, even though it was just above the houses. 

during the event, no one was afraid, just awed by what we saw.
did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Brightly lit flying "craft" near willow creek park.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around at night with some friends when one of them spotted something. i looked up only to see this triangle shaped thing hovering over me about 1500 feet. i instantly got out my camera and zoomed in as much as i could to take the picture you see here. after about 2 hours it shot up in the sky blistering fast.
content.summary: It was like a huge tower floating over me.

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i both witnessed the same thing under two different dates (two seperate occurences). standing outside looking to the west, a light which suddenly appeared (as if someone 'reached' down and turned on a spotlight).  it was a white, circular light, but undefined (it was just a light). the light illuminated a cloud on the night/date and time described above (the light did not illuminate a cloud on the prior occurence). it only illuminated a small portion of the cloud.  the light then sped off and disappeared in an upward motion.  when the light sped off it wasn't as bright as it origionaly appeared (now appearing like a streak.  we witnessed each event alone.  my wife described the same event i described to her about one month prior (with the exception of the cloud).  no tangible object was observed (just a light).  as described previously, it appeared as if someone or something reached down and turned on a spotlight and quickly took it away while it was still on.  i observe the night sky quite frequently, have seen many strange things, but nothing quite like this.  both of us at each event were not purposely looking for anything, we were just wandering.
content.summary: Bright light suddenly appears in the sky then disappears upwards.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west, through a rain and electrical storm, on tippecanoe road which is lined with woods on both sides. the rain had let up some and as i passed a place where the trees opened up, i looked to the left 45 deg., and up 45 deg., and beheld, in the sky, a beautiful group of about four white lights, one above the other of the most pure brilliance i have ever seen. 
it, the group, was not bright in that would hurt ones eyes and make them turn away, it was its purity that i marveled at.
my first thought, and one i held for quite awhile, was that i was looking across a small valley at the top of a hill where someone had several flourescent dusk to dawn lights mounted close together on a pole. it wasn't until some time later that i realized that there is no hill there, because i have traveled that road for years, and also that the lights were not all of the same uniform shape. one of the lights near the top seemed teardrop shaped with the point of the tear drop pointing up toward a 10 o'clock position, the others were of a general square shape with rounded corners and sitting above one another. 

although they were not centered perfectly along the same axis, all the lights were touching one another and were nearly centered.
for some reason i just kept driving like it was something that happens everyday, and that's not my nature, to be so cavalier about anything so  unusual. the google earth co-ordinates of where the lights were located is, to my best estimate, almost exactly: 40-01-08.00 n, by 79-47-00.00 w. 

extra details are that as i was traveling and looking up at the light it seemed that for a split second my car was sitting quietly on the road and not running as i gazed in awe at the light,  i get an extreme case of goosebumps every time i visualize the light, but they are happy goosebumps.
content.summary: Appeared as three or four static, brilliant white dusk to dawn flourescent lights vertically stacked.

content.detailedDescription: 1--home--2 it or i  woke up--3--i know it was a living being4--skipping #4---5--hard for me to put in writing ---can verbally explain better if that is possible---i know what i saw was real---it was not a dream ---do not know were to ask for help wiyh this --do not want to give name yet need to know more before i take next steps--please only contact me by e-mail first if that is possible---thank you
content.summary: This was not a ufo this was a - i don't know how to put this -- this was a being.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 4 am on 6/20/2009, i was travelling east on michigan ave approaching sheridan st., at the bayfront, in waretown (ocean twp.) new jersey. as i approached the bay i could clearly observe a large extremely bright ball of light hovering above the barnegat bay, approximately a quarter mile west of the barnegat inlet. the sky was clear and i would estimate the the "ball" to have been approximately 80'- 100' wide. the object was projecting a direct reflection onto the water, and was hovering aproximately 300 to 400 feet above the water. it was the brightest light i had ever observed in the sky(and i have lived here for over 5 years). i entered my home and travelled to the third floor deck where i retrieved a spotting scope. looking through the scope (which was mounted on a tri-pod) i observed no solid structure, blinking lights, or movement. the object was nearly blinding when observed through the scope. the scope remained in a unchanged position for the duration of the observation, during which time the object never moved, dimmed, or made a sound. at approximately 5 am, the object instantly vanished. 
it should be noted than on 6/21/2009, i mentioned the event to my neighbor to see if he had observed anything similar on that, or any other evening. it was at that time he informed me that during a summer evening in 2008, he had observed a bright ball of light travelling north across barnegat bay. he stated that the object was being chased or followed by 2 fighter jets. he stated that as the object approached the area of barnegat inlet, it made a 90 degree turn, and "shot" west across the sky at a speed that was "to fast to follow with your eyes". he states that the jets then turned back out over the ocean towards atlantic city. 
and finally, it should also be noted that this area of barnegat bay is less than 1 mile from the oyster creek nuclear facility.
content.summary: Extremely bright ball of light hovering over barnegat bay for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription: I spent most of my saturday at lake ouachita and when i got back i went to my friends house to hang out. we left the house around 10:10 to go pick up my girlfriend from work to go get a snow cone with our friends. we took two different vehicles because she lives kinda out of the way. so we left the snow cone place and got on the bypass. we were driving along and talking at about 11:00 she pointed out the window and said "what is that." we were on the bypass right before the airport road exit. i found it in the sky as well. it was a big oval sphere looking thing glowing a light orange. so i immediately pulled over to look at it.I had no idea what it could be we were by the airport but there wasn't a white red or green light on it. i rolled down my window to get a better look and no sound was coming from it. then a white ball of light was dropped from it. the sphere glided a little more toward the north-east. then it faded away for a second then came back. there was a flash then it just disappeared. the only thing that i was thinking was what was that. we waited for a little longer but it never came back. so we set off i missed the exit to her house. but on the opposite side of the bypass there was a police officer pulled over with his lights on inside the cabin and it looked like he was writing something down. and then i took her home and waited on her dad and that's it. the whole sighting lasted less than five minutes.
content.summary: I was taking my girlfriend home after we got a snow cone and saw something we have never seen.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling east bound on i40 just about to cross into texas from nm.  it was cloudy, so no moon.  right about 0230 there was a brilliant flash of bright green light that was daylight intense in all directions.  there was evidence of burning debris falling.  about 20 minutes later i met 4 truck drivers traveling west bound.  they were talking about the green flash of light over them!  they were in vega tx when it happened.  they gave me their exact location.  they also said they saw what looked like burning debris falling. we both were thinking it happened above us and we were over 40 miles apart.  another driver who i talked to about 1 hour later said he was near shamrock tx and saw the green flash start "way above the clouds and went downward".  he could not give a distance estimate, just that is was west of him.  there was no sound of anything blowing up.  i have served in the military and know what a star shell looks like and ariel burst of munitions looks like.  i have never seen anything like this.  there was a sherriff near adrian tx and a state trouper near vega tx that may have witnessed it.  there is also personnel at the nm scale house for the west bound lanes near san jon nm that may have seen it also.

i am a truck driver, just on a routine evening drive.  i did not see a 'fireball" just the entire area as far as i could see in any direction was brilliant green.  i have no idea what i saw, only that i saw it.
content.summary: A bright green flash of light with debris falling seen for at least 44 miles.

content.detailedDescription: On the 19th of june, between 21:30 and 22:30, i was watching the night sky and i saw at least 3 moving objects. because i'm a bit engaged in astronomy, i completely canceled out the possibility of satellites, as i know that they travel in straight lines with constant speeds. during my observation, some of them crossed the sky. there are often a lot of airplanes in the sky above the st. jurij in the gori���ko region, because there are quite some airplane corridors here. but, it was obvious that these lights weren't airplanes, because they weren't making any sounds and they didn't have any positional lights. at first, i saw two changing lights, who were more or less moving in one direction with sharp left and right turns, then they completely stopped, then accelerated etc. they were also changing colors (yellow, green, orange, red etc.). i was watching this event in the completely clear night sky for about 20 minutes, and their movements continued. then, i noticed another strange object, which was moving between the big bear and dragon constellations.  it was much brighter and larger than the other two. when this object was moving across the empty and dark section of the night sky, it brightened everything around it. a couple of times, it made turns in the shape of number 8. once, it went from being normally lit up, like a star, to incredibly bright, like a meteor when it gets into the atmosphere, but then, it instantly became normally lit up again and continued its path across the night sky.  i stopped observing this event after almost an hour, but it probably continued for a long time. because i didn't carry a mobile phone or a camera with me, i couldn't take a picture or shoot a video. this wasn't my first ufo sighting, but it was the first one which i'll post on the internet.
content.summary: 2 small objects like fireballs and 1 bigger and brighter object crossed the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just stepping out of a car, on my way to a birthday party at a friend's house.  i looked up in the sky for no particular reason, and a moving object caught my eye.  it was almost directly above me and looked like a bright star, but it was moving to the north about the speed of a commercial airliner, with ballistic motion.  i would have probably brushed it off as some sort of aircraft if the light had not started to dim.  it seemed to dim at a constant rate, and then began to light up again at the same rate. it remained at its original brightness for a second or so before it began dimming again.  this time the light went completely out.  i waited for about 10 seconds to see if it would return, but it never did.  i then went inside to the party.

after seeing it, i was excited as i tried to rationalize what could have caused the light.  i have never seen a plane's lights do something like that before, and there was no explanation for why the light wouldn't have returned if it were a plane, they sky was completely clear.  there was no tail of any kind, and the speed did not fit a comet or meteor.
content.summary: Moving, bright, star-like object dimmed, lit back to original brightness, then dimmed completely, not seen again.

content.detailedDescription:
I parked the car late at night at a genaurdi's parking lot in wynnewood for some ice cream and noticed a slow-moving object gliding underneath the cloud cover (it has been rainy here for a few days).  at first, i thought it was a slow commercial aircraft but it did not have a traditional aircraft shape.  it was a solid black silhouette against the nighttime clouds.  it flew high above the supermarket and and then turned south.  it had circular bright white lights at each vertex of the black triangular form.  i have seen similar pictures taken of this object before.  i also noticed a strange symmetrical running light pattern.  it was not at all like that of a commercial aircraft.  they were yellow, red and orange and flashed from the outside of the verteces towards the center.  as it flew away from me (towards the se) it seemed as if the flashing running lights were long colored rods.  the pattern was not consistent and changed over time.  there was absolutely no noise as this thing flew and it did not accelerate while i was watching it.  it also banked like an airplane when it turned.  it stayed at a steady slow-moving pace and i lost sight of it when it flew over the trees.  

i did not feel that this aircraft was extraterrestrial.  my feeling was that it is some sort of manmade experimental craft.  it was peculiar but i did not feel awe-struck.
content.summary: Black triangle with strange running lights buzzed over our supermarket.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting on patio having dinner. looked up saw object passing over at 30 000+ feet, maybe a lot higher; it appeared the size of a passenger plane at 30 to 40 000 feet.
moving north to south.
moved as a high flying aircraft but had no apparent wings or tail.
left no vapour trail.
watched for over one minute as it passed from zenith to visible horizon behind houses.
the object was picking up light from the sun at a low angle and i watched to see if wings would become apparent as the angle of the light changed but they did not.
although the object could have been a plane it appeared unlike all other high flying passenger planes. the main reason i thought it strange was because it left no vapour trail at all.
content.summary: Like plane with no wings or tail made no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was at a store drinking sprite

2.I always looked up in the sky everytime a plane passes

3.A plane

4.It���s round and it doesn���t move,it like,they maybe watching me or someone

5.I was scared,i was just silent,and i went onto my house and took my digicam

6.When i got my digicam,when i went outside,it was nowhere to be found
content.summary: Like a dark hole.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving back to my apartment after eating out late at night (it was almost 1am). we were driving north on mopac, approaching fm 2222 (near camp mabry). we were talking as we drove and i was looking out the windshield up at the sky absent-mindedly. suddenly i noticed a bright turquoise pellet shaped object traveling erratically at a high rate of speed over the freeway. it looked very high up to me, my first impression was that it was high enough to be a plane or maybe even a comet, but obviously not the right size, shape, color and speed to be either of those.. the color of the object was a very vibrant bright turquoise, and it definitely emitted it's own glow (much like a comet or shooting star). after about five seconds of watching the object travel, it winked out, like a flame dying. the most notable detail in my mind was the color and the shape of the object. neither changed as it moved, and i have never seen anything that looked like this.

my boyfriend saw the object a couple of seconds after i did. he saw a second smaller light as well, traveling in the same area. he only saw them for a couple of seconds before the lights winked out, but agrees that it must have been traveling very fast and was maneuvering erratically. 

this could have been some sort of celestial object. i don't have much knowledge in astronomy so i wouldn't be surprised if it was something explainable that i have just never heard of. all i know is it would have had to have been traveling at the speed of something like a comet, but it didn't look anything like one (at least none that i've ever seen or heard of). i know of nothing man-made that could have looked like this and moved as fast as this object did (especially as high up as it was).

the object was many times larger than a shooting star. the bigger object (the one i saw) was one light as high up or higher than a plane, but occupying about twice as much space as an airplane would tail to tip.
we couldn't have been more than a mile north of camp mabry when we saw it.

i'm hoping some other people in austin saw and will report this to mufon. i am really curious as to what it was!
content.summary: Bright turquoise pellet shaped object traveling erratically at high rate of speed over mopac freeway.

content.detailedDescription: I worked for rocky mountain cementers in farmington, nm and had taken an older truck to denver to exchange for a new one being completed. i had spent most of the day in my motel waiting for the new truck when i was told it wasn't ready and wouldn't be for a couple of weeks. i had to drive the old one back again, but that was fine with me, because i was fully rested and ready to go. it was early when i got to colorado springs and passed the air force academy being built and it was soon after passing ft. carson that i was going up this mountain and when i looked to my right i saw what looked like a big harvest moon coming up. i thought that's nice, because it would make the roads easier to see, especially on wolf creek pass. then i did a double take because i realized this "moon" was coming up in the south and it seemed to be gaining altitude fast. i was just a short distance from the top of the grade i was on and as soon as i reached the top i stopped, set the brakes and shut the engine off and stood on the running board to watch this "thing". in about a minute it was passing overhead and never made a sound, but i could tell it was moving along. at night, in the mountains it gets very dark and it's impossible to judge distance. i don't know how high it was, but it was big. off to my left i could make out another mountain ridge line but don't know if it was fifty or a hundred miles away. this thing made it there in just 2 or 3 minutes and as it disappeared behind the mountains, i kept waiting for a big bang, a flash of an explosion or something. i got nothing but the silence i had heard ever since i pulled over and stopped. what ever this thing was it made the hair stand up on the back of my neck like i never felt before or since. needless to say, i was very wide awake for the entire trip to farmington. the next day listened to every news report i could catch and scanned the denver and farmington papers for information on this thing, because as big as it was i new others had to have seen it. i found nothing and never have. about 10 or 15 years ago i heard some reports from colorado about sightings of round orange objects, but because of my job i never had time to investigate the matter. can anyone shed any light on what i saw? this thing just came up in the south, made a big arc and went down behind the mountains to the north.
content.summary: It looked like a big harvest moon rising, except it was rising from the south.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were coming out of charlie's cafe in the late afternoon/early evening. i saw a flying vehicle that i thought was a dark helicopter over the buildings of mill st just a few hundred ft away if that. it had no blades and made no sound and suddenly it shapeshifted and continued to do so...Then it broke apart into two pieces and went back together again. well i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but my mother was seeing the same thing happen. so i moved to the next parking lot next to carolines roasters and continued watching it change shape as it moved slowly along and then it turned west. i got back on the road and hoped it would not disappear before i could catch up with it again which i did at the top of main st by the cemetery at squirrel creek rd. i watched it for a good long time there, had time to call my three friends who are into ufos, one of whom had a house almost directly beneath the craft. it was higher in the sky now, but stationary and still changing shape and separating and reconjoining. bill was not home, ronna lee and marsha also but the two women called me while i was still watching the craft with my mother, then it turned an headed north again towards their houses but it was climbing faster now and soon became to small for me to see. i remembered at some point that i had a camera with me and took pics and video of the event at the third sighting. what i was seeing was as dark as the trees in the photos but it does not show up on the film. it was very frustration. i just couldn't believe it. but there are a sort of watercolor smudges on the fil where the craft was, perhaps with enlargement and enhancement it could be seen better. afterward i was thrilled. i had not had a sighting in a long time. used to all the time. it was quite thrilling, and to have my mom, a witness, was even better.
i just wish i had remembered my camera while it was still over the buildings downtown. i have the photos on my camera but no way to get them off and to you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo low over mill st, shape shifted and came apart then west and then north again.

content.detailedDescription:
7 more people saw the same event. 
the camera was not even powerful to take picture even though the object might be 2-5 kms away. 
it was hidding behind the mist since there was some radiation mist because of the rain in the afternoon and the heat in the night consequent effect.
we are very near an airport mroc (costa rica) and we can tell the lights of a plane and its distinctive sound and im 90% sure it was not one. the color of it was a reddish orange blinking light.

1. we were at a family meeting having some bbq
2.People on th esurroundings started noticing it.
3. we think object was just hovering between fog and clouds
4.Rounded orange like color advancing and then braking the doi9ng it back and forth.
5. everybody was surprised about the event. personally this is my second encounter on my life.
6. object suddenly faded out even though there was not enough clouds and/or mist to make it invisible it just faded out. if u ask me i think it was like similar to a flashlight when its running low 9on batteries kinda like fading randomly and then totally off.
content.summary: Spheric orange object braking and moving randomly.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of incident i was in my hot tub around 130am and as usual i like to star gaze facing directly south. the object i seen was huge!!!! it was a perfect triangle with 3 illuminated white lights to make 3 points as in the shape of a triangle. when i say huge i mean this thing had to be 500ft in every latteral length of the triangle. my reaction was holy crap i think i seen the space station, but up until recently i was at a gathering with friends and we were talking about this object and he mentioned there is no way the space station is that big......I can still see it in my mind like it was yesterday! it came from the north west and cruised overhead an actual 30 seconds plain as day clear sky and eventually headed in a south eastern direction. a visual was lost by eventually being too far away. if i could draw it it would be a perfect triangle with three illuminated dots on either joining latteral of the triangle. i am curious to know if it was the space station or not.
content.summary: It travelled faster than a jet but slower than a satelite.

content.detailedDescription: Today at 5:30pm, while swimming at the community pool at my mother in law's condo complex just off the corner of ashdale and burnet rd, my wife, mother-in-law, and my two children witnessed a very loud and unnaturally low-flying military fighter jet formation.  i believe they were f-16's judging by the wing configuration.  they were 4 or 5.  i am not sure because i was caught up trying to get everyone to look, and to try to reason whether or not law prevents low altitude fly overs of residential areas by military aircraft.  i also noted that the speed of the military craft did not seem to be very fast, and based on the absence of a sonic boom, i can only assume they were not on afterburners.  i will look that up after posting this report.  immediately after the military aircraft disappeared from view, i noticed a small, white single engine civilian aircraft at a much higher altitude (above or at least in the cloud deck) traveling in a flight path that was perpindicular to that of the fighter jets.  as i tracked the smaller civilian aircraft, at some point, a small brightly glowing pink orb, sphere, or dot, whichever you prefer passed just "under" the civilian aircraft in the visual field.  as my family and i tracked the object, we noted that it appeared to be small, was glowing bright pink, and was rapidly moving in a straight line on a course roughly opposite the course of the civilian aircraft.  as it encountered clouds in the visual field, we noted that it remained visible and therefore must be moving at an altitude below the cloud deck.  the object's speed compared to the military and civilian aircraft gave the impression that although it was obviously at a lower altitude, that it was traveling too quickly to have been a baloon blowing in the wind, which at this time was almost dead calm.  we also noted that due to it's seeming flat, or even slightly ascending flight path, it's lack of a tail or trail, and due to it's speed, it could not be a meteorite or falling space debris.  to comment specifically on the speed, it was moving as quickly at it's altitude as i have seen commercial airliners on a landing approach move at a similar altitude, so i concluded that it was moving so fast that it had to be moving under power or propulsion of some sort, and that it's speed was such that compared to other "shooting star" meteorite sightings i've had in the past, it was much too slow, and remained visible too long on a flat or slightly ascending flight path to be a meteorite or shooting star.  perhaps 5 to 7 minutes after the unidentified object left my field of vision, we all witnessed 2 more roughly spherical objects that appeared to be at the same altitude and on the same heading as the previous unidentified object.  these two objects were traveling in a vertically opposed, tandem configuration.  both objects were oscillating colors between bright red and silver (reflective).  the object at the top of the tandem configuration was very steady, but the object at the bottom of the tandem configuration was tumbling erratically, but maintaining same course and speed as the top object, and though it moved  about under the top object erratically, it stayed a constant distance from the top object, roughly the equivalent of the diameter of either object (as they appeard to be roughly the same size).  we watched it for as long as we could, observing it passing rapidly under clouds, and we exited the pool continuing to adjust our position on the ground until we could no longer track it without leaving the pool area.  as the second pair of object left the visual field we observed what appeared to be a red and blue civilian helicopter on a heading to intercept the two objects, though at a much lower altitude.  the helicopter seems to have been on the same basic flight path of the two tandem object, leading me to believe that the helicopter may have been observing and/or pursuing the tandem objects.  the second sighting lasted roughly twice the duration of the first.
content.summary: Possible daytime sighting - small pink glowing fast moving orb under cloud deck after f16 fly over at condo complex pool.
